sub_title: Head of Sales Europe West @ DLL | Strategic Marketing
summary:
With over 15 years of experience in strategy and  sales leadership in an international environment, I am a passionate and driven leader who thrives on challenging the status quo, creating value, and delivering commercial success. 
As professional in asset based financing and leasing, I have worked closely with manufacturers, resellers/dealer and (large) clients in many industries such as Food & Beverages, Agriculture, Construction and Transportation.

As the Head of Sales Europe West - Food & Agri at DLL, I lead a team of 20+ finance professionals who partner with global leading manufacturers in the agricultural and food processing and packaging industry.

My core competencies include developing and executing commercial strategies, co-creating new business models and products, overseeing key elements of strategic projects, and building strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders. 

I have a deep understanding of the financial, food and beverage, and agricultural industries, and I leverage my expertise in strategic planning, digital and online marketing, social media, and innovation. 

My focus is to empower my team, my partners, and my customers to achieve their goals and grow together.

profile_positions.description:
In this role I support countries and/or regions in the DLL network (over 35 countries in Americas, EMEA and AsiaPac) in the development of their strategic (marketing) plans. Key element is the alignment of the Group Commercial Strategy and the industry specific strategies. Although operating on a global level special focus is for the regions Europe and AsiaPac. The involvement continuous with the implementation and/or execution of the plans or specific initiatives, partly based on previous experience.

Next to these main tasks and responsibilities I am involved in company wide projects as rebranding and Life Cycle Asset Management, from my point of view as Marketing specialist.
profile_positions.title: Global Strategic Marketing Consulting & Planning Manager

profile_positions.description:
Next to my role as Global Strategic Marketing Consulting & Planning Manager I am responsible for developing and managing new and existing product, according to DLL Groups Product Approval and Review Process on a global level. This responsibility includes managing product developement processes, as well as capturing product value for customers as well as DLL through detailed product reviews (in alignments with global policies based on international laws and legislation). Out of these reviews products are further developed in order to meet present customer requirements and needs and to adjust to future trends.

Next to close coopration with the global commercial domain and regional DLL branches, successful development and execution requires a close relation with Rabobank Group and DLL corporate domains such as Compliance, Risk and Legal.

The challenge in this role is to support the global group and commercial strategies, whilst implementing compliance policies into an international organization, in order to enable this organization to utilize the benefits. Main stakeholder in this process is the Product Approval and Review Committee (chaired by an Executive Board member).

Recent products I have been involved with (development and/or review) are amongst others leasing, consumer finance, private leasing, commercial finance, insurance/waivers and factoring, the majority with an international scope. My key responsibility is in offering strategic marketing input, managing the development process and safeguarding high quality and complete product cases (including business case).
